comment:
* Description of a billing relationship plan between a carrier and a specific
 * subscriber. This information is used to present more useful UI to users, such
 * as explaining how much mobile data they have remaining, and what will happen
 * when they run out.
 *
 * If specifying network types, the developer must supply at least one plan
 * that applies to all network types (default), and all additional plans
 * may not include a particular network type more than once.
 * This is enforced by {@link SubscriptionManager} when setting the plans.
 *
 * Plan selection will prefer plans that have specific network types defined
 * over plans that apply to all network types.
 *
 * @see SubscriptionManager#setSubscriptionPlans(int, java.util.List)
 * @see SubscriptionManager#getSubscriptionPlans(int)

variables.name: LIMIT_BEHAVIOR_UNKNOWN
variables.comment: When a resource limit is hit, the behavior is unknown.

variables.name: LIMIT_BEHAVIOR_DISABLED
variables.comment: When a resource limit is hit, access is disabled.

variables.name: LIMIT_BEHAVIOR_BILLED
variables.comment: When a resource limit is hit, the user is billed automatically.

variables.name: LIMIT_BEHAVIOR_THROTTLED
variables.comment: When a resource limit is hit, access is throttled to a slower rate.

variables.name: BYTES_UNKNOWN
variables.comment: Value indicating a number of bytes is unknown.

variables.name: BYTES_UNLIMITED
variables.comment: Value indicating a number of bytes is unlimited.

variables.name: TIME_UNKNOWN
variables.comment: Value indicating a timestamp is unknown.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
public CharSequence getTitle()
methods.comment: Return the short title of this plan.

methods.name: public CharSequence getSummary()
methods.comment: Return the short summary of this plan.

methods.name: public long getDataLimitBytes()
methods.comment:
* Return the usage threshold at which data access changes according to
     * {@link #getDataLimitBehavior()}.

methods.name: public int getDataLimitBehavior()
methods.comment:
* Return the behavior of data access when usage reaches
     * {@link #getDataLimitBytes()}.

methods.name: public long getDataUsageBytes()
methods.comment:
* Return a snapshot of currently known mobile data usage at
     * {@link #getDataUsageTime()}.

methods.name: public long getDataUsageTime()
methods.comment: * Return the time at which {@link #getDataUsageBytes()} was valid.

methods.name: public int[] getNetworkTypes()
methods.comment:
* Return an array containing all {@link NetworkType}s this SubscriptionPlan applies to.
     * @see TelephonyManager for network types values

methods.name: public Iterator<Range<ZonedDateTime>> cycleIterator()
methods.comment:
* Return an iterator that will return all valid data usage cycles based on
     * any recurrence rules. The iterator starts from the currently active cycle
     * and walks backwards through time.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
